skills.name: RAPIER
desc: • Deals random damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to gain Invincibility for 1 turn.

skills.name: DIE HARD
desc: • Deals 70% of the enemy’s MAX HP as true damage.
• Grants Increased Accuracy and Critical Strike Chance to all allies for 2 turns.
• Inflicts Perfect Silence on self for 3 turns.

skills.name: SILENCER
desc: Gain Perfect Hit for 2 turns at the start of battle. Inflict Silence on self and Perfect Silence on up to 2 random enemies for the first 2 turns of battle. Grant Immunity to Burn effects to all allies.
